subject: Problem with Simsonn Racing Carbon Fiber Steering Wheel Hub
description_text:
Hi,

i have a problem with this product, when i put on wheel base, not working,
when release, work. i attach a vídeo. i have a csl dd fanatec

conversations.body_text: Hi Miguel Angel Martin Serrano,  Please make sure your computer is plugged into a three-prong wall socket to ensure proper grounding. Then follow the grounding method below, which can resolve interference from the Fanatec CLS DD affecting the wheel hub.              https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding
